title: Evolved Game Creatures Sound Effects
description: The Evolved Game Creatures collection brings producers and sound designers a versatile and wide ranging selection of large to medium creature & monster styled game sound effects.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

Useful in animations, video games, mobile apps, motion graphics, film, and software development, Evolved Game Creatures is a go to collection of monster sounds and audio creativity. Inside you’ll find over 160+ distinctive, immersive, game optimized creature sound effects, vocalizations, attacks, death sounds, special SFX & more. Creating compelling cinematic game characters and outstanding gameplay audio experiences has never been easier. Explore thru 10 inspiring sound sets of your favorite mystical creatures, supernatural beings that are perfect for any fantasy production! Each sound set & creature will have sounds for attacks, death, damage, spawn, hits, impacts, and breathing.

Creature List:

  • Ancient Dragon - (Dinosaur Creature)
  • Balor - (Supernatural Creature)
  • Basilisk - (Lizard/Reptile Creature)
  • Frost Giant - (Large Humanoid Creature)
  • Kraken - (Water Creature)
  • Mammoth - (Elephant Creature)
  • Roc - (Dinosaur Bird Creature)
  • Sphinx - (Lion/Tiger Creature)
  • Spider Queen - (Insect Creature)
  • Treant - (Tree Creature)

Evolved Game Creatures is designed specifically for games. The audio texture of the entire sound library is deep, dynamic and rich. This collection is perfect for designed monster sounds effects you might find while roaming around in a game, MMO, RPG, or for animalistic villains, creatures, enemy bosses, non-player characters, bots or antagonist characters in your next game and so on.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 132.7 MB of samples
  • 168 sound effect files
  • Monster & Creature Sound Effects Library
  • Game Ready & Designed Sound Effects
  • 10 different creature and monster sound sets
  • Perfect for game developers and sound designers
  • Over 5 minutes fantasy game creatures audio
  • Each monster includes multiple attacks, death, pain, special fx, character specific fx & more 
  • All Royalty-Free
  • All files are game-ready, mastered and optimized in length, size to reduce game distributions and space.
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)

Number of Audio Waves: 168

Number of Audio Cues: 168

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5
